PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-09952003-06-18,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActInsurance Companies Act
PrecisEnactment of the EXEMPTION FROM APPROVAL FOR CERTAIN INVESTMENTS IN INTRAGROUP SERVICE ENTITIES (LIFE COMPANIES AND INSURANCE HOLDING COMPANIES) REGULATIONS which clarify that life companies and insurance holding companies may, without applying for the Superintendent's or the Minister's approval, invest in entities solely engaged in lending exclusively to members of their own group.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0244 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
